# gaftools

`gaftools` is a pangenome tool that predicts germline or somatic structural variation from the long read whole genome sequencing data. The experiment could be either normal-only, tumor-only or tumor-normal paired sequencing.


# Installation

``` {bash}
mamba create -n pangenome python==3.10 poetry
conda activate pangenome
git clone https://github.com/qinqian/gaftools
cd gaftools
poetry install
```

# Usage

``` {bash}
gaftools parse -m 30 -l 100 --input gaf_or_paf -r 3 -p bed_output

-m mapping quality
-l large indel size threshold
--input gaf_or_paf input file path, generated by minigraph or minimap2
-p bed_output, output bed gzip file for all the merged indel after threshold

```
